Web Development

Spine-health.com

Veritas Health

Skills

  • HTML,
  • SCSS,
  • Drupal,
  • Twig,
  • PatternLab,
  • WCAG Accessibility Standards

Responsible for the front-end design of Veritas Health properties. Over the course of 8 years, we updated from a non-responsive, non-mobile friendly site, to a fully responsive custom Drupal theme.

Established the companyâ€™s first accessibility guidelines for all sites, meeting WCAG 2.1 AA standards. Created internal documentation, updated brand style guides, worked with a third party to audit and remediate accessibility issues on our sites. Improved Google Lighthouse accessibility score from an average of 55 to 100/100. Captioned 250 videos, and managed audit and re-writing of over 1,000 alt tags for medical imaging.

Coached visual designer on wireframe development, introducing component design.

Improved time on page for Doctor Profile redesign by 42% and improved click-thru-rate for appointment requests from 0.2% to 4%.

  • Visit Spine-health.com

Digital Signage

Gatton College of Business & Economics

Skills

  • Drupal,
  • Theming,
  • Views,
  • HTML,
  • CSS

Drupal drives the Digital Signage at the Gatton College of Business and Economics. I created a calendar content type, and used various views and taxonomy to deliver the calendar content to three television screens throughout the building. Five content editors were trained to update the college calendar through Drupal.
